# The `SIOptimizeExecMaskingPreRA.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This pass performs exec mask handling peephole optimizations which needs to be done before register allocation to reduce register pressure. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This pass performs exec mask handling peephole optimizations which needs to be done before register allocation to reduce register pressure.

<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the only user of a logical operation is move to exec, fold it now</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to prevent forming of saveexec. I.e.:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
